text: Randolph Frederick Edward Spencer-Churchill (28 May 1911 – 6 June 1968) was a British journalist, writer, soldier and politician. He was Conservative Member of Parliament (MP) for Preston from 1940 to 1945.Article by Robert Blake. He was the only son of Prime Minister Sir Winston Churchill and his wife, Clementine. ==References== Category:1911 births Category:1968 births Category:Conservative Party (UK) MPs Category:UK MPs 1935–1945 Category:Politicians from London Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Winston Churchill
title: Randolph Churchill
